sentences.en: A 3 land parcel, in nearness piece area only mountain massif park area, scenery joy person.
sentences.cn: A3地块, 靠近片区内惟一的山体公园区, 景色怡人.

sentences.en: All the while I was acutely aware of her nearness.
sentences.cn: 我一直强烈地意识到她离我很近.

sentences.en: God is nearer to me than I am to myself; my existence depends on the nearness and the presence of God.
sentences.cn: 上帝比我更靠近我自己；我的存在取决于上帝的存在以及上帝离我有多近。

sentences.en: Has there ever been higher expression of the overwhelming nearness and glory of God?
sentences.cn: 谁有比此更高而窘迫的经验得以亲近荣耀的神.

sentences.en: He was suddenly aware of his nearness.
sentences.cn: 他突然意识到离得近了.

sentences.en: His nearness unsettled her even more; why could not he sIt'somewhere else.
sentences.cn: 与他咫尺相近更加使她烦躁不安; 他为什么就不能坐到别的地方去呢?

sentences.en: In the softness of her voice he could feel her trust and her nearness.
sentences.cn: 他从她低柔的声音里感到一种距离很近的信赖.

sentences.en: Let your love see me even through the barrier of nearness.
sentences.cn: 让你的爱情看见我罢,即使前面隔了一层亲近那障碍物.

sentences.en: Nearness or distance seems more and more meaningless.
sentences.cn: 靠近或疏离,或许已变得越来越无所谓.

sentences.en: Once his very nearness would have set her a - tremble.
sentences.cn: 以前,只要他一靠近便会叫她浑身颤抖.

sentences.en: There is another aspect of His nearness. It is very intimate and close relationship with him.
sentences.cn: 另外一种神与我们的接近, 不只是距离上的,而是我们与祂关系上的亲密.

sentences.en: They lost the nearness of the first months of their marriage.
sentences.cn: 他们失去了他们结婚头几个月的那种亲热.

trans.tran_cn: （距离、时间等）近，接近，（关系的）亲密，密切
